/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees are interspersed between the buildings, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
